exceptions¶

Documentation for the exception classes in the utilities.exception module:

class utilities.exceptions.InvalidSourceError(source)¶

Exception that gives an error message if the type of the source file given to a function is incorrect

__init__(source)¶
class utilities.exceptions.InvalidArrayGenRequestError(for_training, for_testing, mixing=False)¶

Exception that gives an error message if there is an incompatibility of the number of source file given and the type of array to import

Parameters:
for_training, for_testing, mixedbool

Flags that select which type of error message to show

__init__(for_training, for_testing, mixing=False)¶
class utilities.exceptions.LoadHeadError(header_path)¶

Exception that gives an error message if the header file cannot be found in the selected path

__init__(header_path)¶
class utilities.exceptions.IncorrectFractionError(f)¶

Exception that gives an error message if the given fraction of Kaons (to be used in the dataset generation) is non-physical.

__init__(f)¶
class utilities.exceptions.IncorrectNumGenError¶

Exception that gives an error if the given number of events to be stored in the MC and mixed datasets is incompatible with the event size of the toyMCs

__init__()¶

cmepda-PiKclassifier
